title: League In Game Client Acts like an Overlay
body:
So, my computer has True Colors running on it, and also I use Spotify when playing. Recently, when I get into game, League hides the box on the top left where the music is playing and True Colors does not work. When I minimize out of the in game client, True colors is working. Help please.

(https://gyazo.com/c1c9dac6be53aafcca52170f6374084b) (The box that shows)

replies.body:
So about that top left box first, I'm not sure that you'll be able to have a window hovering on top of League when you're playing. Anytime you click on the game it's going to force league towards the top.

On the subject of True Colors, sadly it's just not compatible with most games just yet, including League. The number of color combinations is a bit too high for a lot of games to be able to handle while transitioning between so many colors so quickly.
Thanks for such a quick response. It was working before, but I don't know what happened. Thanks tho.
